body_text: For this and a number of the other modules (basically, everything besides Task.jsm and XPCOMUtils), we should use lazy getters so as not to initialize these modules as soon as someone loads this jsm.
body: For this and a number of the other modules (basically, everything besides Task.jsm and XPCOMUtils), we should use lazy getters so as not to initialize these modules as soon as someone loads this jsm.
